DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate abuse potential lorcaserin healthy recreational polydrug user .
DOC.brief_title: Abuse Potential Single Doses Lorcaserin Healthy Recreational Polydrug Users
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA 1 . Healthy male female subject 18 55 year age , inclusive . 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) within range 18 33 kg/m2 , inclusive , minimum weight least 50 kg Screening . 3 . Free clinically significant medical psychiatric abnormality 4 . Recreational polydrug user history psychedelic depressant drug use , least one occasion use past 3 month . 5 . Female subject must negative serum pregnancy test Screening urine pregnancy test admission . 6 . Female subject childbearing potential must practise abstinence use willing continue use medically acceptable form birth control least 1 month last study drug administration . Male subject female partner childbearing potential must ensure partner use acceptable method contraception . 7 . Willingness take drug might alter perception control setting . EXCLUSION CRITERIA A subject consider eligible participate study , one follow exclusion criterion satisfy : 1 . A history presence drug alcohol dependence ( exclude nicotine caffeine ) . 2 . Use nonprescription , prescription medication natural health product ( except acetaminophen , vitamin mineral supplement , acceptable form birth control , hormone replacement ) within 7 day prior first drug administration qualification phase throughout study . 3 . Use SSRIs ( e.g . fluoxetine , paroxetine , citalopram ) within 14 day prior first drug administration qualification phase throughout study . 4 . History allergy hypersensitivity study drug 5 . Female subject currently pregnant lactate plan become pregnant within 30 day last study drug administration 6 . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day prior first drug administration qualification phase .
